text: Heikki Hulkkonen (born 3 July 1955) is a Finnish modern pentathlete and fencer. He competed both events at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish male fencers Category:Finnish male modern pentathletes Category:Olympic fencers of Finland Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Finland Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Modern pentathletes at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Modern pentathletes at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Orimattila
title: Heikki Hulkkonen
